question: Can I use free icons for commercial purposes?
answer: It depends on the license agreement of each icon. Some free icons are only for personal use. Others allow commercial use, but often require attributing the author. You will need to check the licenses before using the free icons. Read more about [licenses](https://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/18233-license-overview).

question: How do I know if I have to attribute the author?
answer: Make sure to check the license agreement for each free icon before using it. If attribution is required, the license name will often mention it with keywords such as 'attribution', 'credit' or 'include link to author's website'.

question: How to attribute the author?
answer: If the license of a free icon requires attribution, you can include the designer's name and a link to their website or to their Iconfinder page wherever you use the icon. Find out more about [how to credit the icon designer](https://support.iconfinder.com/en/articles/1786643-how-to-credit-the-designer-of-an-icon).

question: For how long can I use the free icons downloaded from Iconfinder?
answer: You can use the icons downloaded from Iconfinder indefinitely, as long as you abide by the license terms of each icon.
